data.title: U.S. military communities
data.meta_description: Deliver certification exams at on-base test centers and offer learning materials to service members and their dependents.
data.text:
Test-takers

We offer military-specific resources to help you navigate the certification process. From locating your nearest base-sponsored test center to exploring potential certification funding options and scheduling your exam, take the next step in your career â€” get certified.

Test owners

We work closely with federal agencies to deliver their exams on military bases. Find out how we can help you take your program to the next level, with expert content development, an expansive test center network, and candidate services.

Procurement & training

Pearson VUE offers learning materials, certification vouchers and procurement management solutions to the U.S. Armed Services community for bulk purchase. Explore our collection of tools and resources to make the most of your training and certification budget.
